sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"install"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#install"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Install`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"manual-install"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#manual-install"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Manual install`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`npm install react-native-share --save`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"ios-install"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#ios-install"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`IOS Install`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`npm install react-native-share --save`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`In XCode, in the project navigator, right click `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Libraries`}</MDXTag>{`  `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Add Files to [your project's name]`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`Go to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`node_modules`}</MDXTag>{`  `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`react-native-share`}</MDXTag>{`  `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`ios`}</MDXTag>{` and add `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`RNShare.xcodeproj`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`In XCode, in the project navigator, select your project. Add `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`libRNShare.a`}</MDXTag>{` to your project's `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Build Phases`}</MDXTag>{`  `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Link Binary With Libraries`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`In XCode, in the project navigator, select your project. Add `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Social.framework`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`MessageUI.framework`}</MDXTag>{` to your project's `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`General`}</MDXTag>{`  `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Linked Frameworks and Libraries`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`In file Info.plist, add`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-xml"}}>{`<key>LSApplicationQueriesSchemes</key>
<array>
  <string>whatsapp</string>
  <string>mailto</string>
</array>
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`Run your project (`}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Cmd+R`}</MDXTag>{`)`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"android-install"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#android-install"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Android Install`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`npm install react-native-share --save`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Open up `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`android/app/src/main/java/[...]/MainApplication.java`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Add `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`import cl.json.RNSharePackage;`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`import cl.json.ShareApplication;`}</MDXTag>{` to the imports at the top of the file`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Add `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`new RNSharePackage()`}</MDXTag>{` to the list returned by the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`getPackages()`}</MDXTag>{`
method`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components} props={{"start":3}}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`Append the following lines to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`android/settings.gradle`}</MDXTag>{`:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`include ':react-native-share'
project(':react-native-share').projectDir = new File(rootProject.projectDir,    '../node_modules/react-native-share/android')
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`Insert the following lines inside the dependencies block in
`}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`android/app/build.gradle`}</MDXTag>{`:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`  compile project(':react-native-share')
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`Follow this
`}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://developer.android.com/training/secure-file-sharing/setup-sharing.html"}}>{`guide`}</MDXTag>{`.
For example:`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`Put this in `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`AndroidManifest.xml`}</MDXTag>{` where `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`applicationId`}</MDXTag>{` is something that
you have defined in `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`android/app/build.gradle`}</MDXTag>{`:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-xml"}}>{`  <application>
    <provider
        android:name="android.support.v4.content.FileProvider"
        android:authorities="\${applicationId}.provider"
        android:grantUriPermissions="true"
        android:exported="false">
        <meta-data
            android:name="android.support.FILE_PROVIDER_PATHS"
            android:resource="@xml/filepaths" />
    </provider>
  </application>
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`Create a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`filepaths.xml`}</MDXTag>{` under this directory:
`}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`android/app/src/main/res/xml`}</MDXTag>{`. In this file, add the following contents:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-xml"}}>{`  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
  <paths xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
      <external-path name="myexternalimages" path="Download/" />
  </paths>
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components} props={{"start":6}}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Edit your `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`MainApplication`}</MDXTag>{` class to implement `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`ShareApplication`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`Also add the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`getFileProviderAuthority`}</MDXTag>{` method to your MainApplication class,
and have it return the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`android:authorities`}</MDXTag>{` that was added in
AndroidManifest file.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">
<MDXTag name="p" components={components} parentName="li">{`For example: Replace the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`com.example.yourappidhere`}</MDXTag>{` below with the
`}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`applicationId`}</MDXTag>{` that is defined in your `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`android/app/build.gradle`}</MDXTag>{`. It must
be `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://github.com/EstebanFuentealba/react-native-share/issues/200#issuecomment-361938532"}}>{`hard-coded here to work
properly`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components} parentName="li"><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`import cl.json.ShareApplication

class MyApplication extends Application implements ShareApplication, ReactApplication {

{

     //...

     @Override
     public String getFileProviderAuthority() {
            return "com.example.yourappidhere.provider";
     }

}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"windows-install"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#windows-install"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Windows Install`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://github.com/ReactWindows/react-native"}}>{`Read it! :D`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`npm install react-native-share --save`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`In Visual Studio add the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`RNShare.sln`}</MDXTag>{` in `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`node_modules/react-native-share/windows/RNShare.sln`}</MDXTag>{` folder to their solution, reference from their app.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Open up your `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`MainPage.cs`}</MDXTag>{` app`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Add `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`using Cl.Json.RNShare;`}</MDXTag>{` to the usings at the top of the file`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Add `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`new RNSharePackage()`}</MDXTag>{` to the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`List<IReactPackage>`}</MDXTag>{` returned by the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`Packages`}</MDXTag>{` method`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag></MDXTag>
